credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors and from Eleanor G. Hewitt Fund
title: Mausoleum
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, red pencil
description: Horizontal rectangle. Similar ot 1938-88-1130. Top: the elevation of the central structure. The lower part is surrounded by a colonnade which is connected with the flanking ones which end with steeples. Above it rises the upper story and teh pediment of a vestibule, containing the staircase. Bottom: Section through the central building, the vestibule, the portico, and the elevation of a colonnade, enclosing an atrium. Numbered "85".
name: Drawing
